info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 2:57PM EDT until July 31 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Moore County in central North Carolina... Scotland County in central North Carolina... Eastern Richmond County in central North Carolina... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 256 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hoffman, or 9 miles northeast of Rockingham, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Laurinburg, Rockingham, Hamlet, Maxton, Hoffman, Ellerbe, Foxfire, Dobbins Heights, Wagram and Gibson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
